# addMetadata(_:completion:)

**Instance Method**

Adds metadata to the builder.

## Declaration

```swift
func addMetadata(_ metadata: [String : Any], completion: @escaping (Bool, (any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func addMetadata(_ metadata: [String : Any]) async throws
```

## Building the route

- **finishRoute(with:metadata:completion:)**: Creates, saves, and associates the route with the provided workout.
- **insertRouteData(_:completion:)**: Adds route data to the builder.
